_aChangeLog.text: - Fixing position of a lot objects.
- Fixing a lot of errors and bugs.
- Added brushes inside of inside cactus (so bullets don't fly as through an empty object).
- Making a holes for chimney pipes, near hostages.
- Added brushes inside of chimney pipes (that not have colliders, so do not be as an emty object), near hostages.
Added some "Clip" objects (colliders from brushes) to certain entries (for smoot movement).
- Also added "Clip" objects to the roots of the big tree (for smoot movement).
- Edited navigation of bots (for cool movement among the new objects).

_sText:
-Hello guys! We present to you our  map , based on western topic and inspired from western classic.

We hope you will enjoy. :)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story: A filming platform has been attacked by some unknown terrorists. Bandits have demanded $ 500,000 for the release of hostages plus a helicopter.

Counter Terrorists: Our state does not fulfill the requirements of terrorists! Eliminate all  terrorists and save hostages!

Terrorists: We can expect a wave of counterattack. Under no circumstances don't let counter-terrorists to escape the hostages! They represent our guarantee of success.

Notes: Four hostages remained alive on the filming platform. Three hostages are on the roof of a house on the right of the damaged train. Another hostage is on the roof of a house on the left of the train.

Credits: 

Marin Colta - main level designer, idea of map, basic geometry & lights, positioning objects, main object and position, hostages placement.

Dmitry Ghervas - mentor, minimap, errors & bugs fixing, 3D sky, editing of bot navigation.

=======================================

Instalation instruction:

Unzip the file "CS_Western-Filmset.zip" into the main folder of the game.

Leave a comment !
